#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=The Leprechaun
#Text=The shell carried us straight back to the house of Yolara .
#Text=Larry was awaiting me .
#Text=We stood again before the tenebrous wall where first we had faced the priestess and the Voice .
#Text=And as we stood , again the portal appeared with all its disconcerting , magical abruptness .
#Text=But now the scene was changed .

#Text=Around the jet table were grouped a number of figures -- Lugur , Yolara beside him ; seven others -- all of them fair-haired and all men save one who sat at the left of the priestess -- an old , old woman , how old I could not tell , her face bearing traces of beauty that must once have been as great as Yolara 's own , but now ravaged , in some way awesome ; through its ruins the fearful , malicious gaiety shining out like a spirit of joy held within a corpse !
#Text=Began then our examination , for such it was .
#Text=And as it progressed I was more and more struck by the change in the O'Keefe .
#Text=All flippancy was gone , rarely did his sense of humour reveal itself in any of his answers .

#Text=He was like a cautious swordsman , fencing , guarding , studying his opponent ; or rather , like a chess-player who keeps sensing some far-reaching purpose in the game : alert , contained , watchful .
#Text=Always he stressed the power of our surface races , their multitudes , their solidarity .
#Text=Their questions were myriad .
#Text=What were our occupations ?
#Text=Our system of government ?
#Text=How great were the waters ?
#Text=The land ?
#Text=Intensely interested were they in the World War , querying minutely into its causes , its effects .
#Text=In our weapons their interest was avid .

#Text=And they were exceedingly minute in their examination of us as to the ruins which had excited our curiosity ; their position and surroundings -- and if others than ourselves might be expected to find and pass through their entrance !
#Text=At this I shot a glance at Lugur .
#Text=He did not seem unduly interested .
#Text=I wondered if the Russian had told him as yet of the girl of the rosy wall of the Moon Pool Chamber and the real reasons for our search .
#Text=Then I answered as briefly as possible -- omitting all reference to these things .
#Text=The red dwarf watched me with unmistakable amusement -- and I knew Marakinoff had told him .
#Text=But clearly Lugur had kept his information even from Yolara ; and as clearly she had spoken to none of that episode when O'Keefe 's automatic had shattered the Keth-smitten vase .
#Text=Again I felt that sense of deep bewilderment -- of helpless search for clue to all the tangle .
#Text=For two hours we were questioned and then the priestess called Rador and let us go .
#Text=Larry was sombre as we returned .
#Text=He walked about the room uneasily .
#Text=" Hell 's brewing here all right , " he said at last , stopping before me .
#Text=" I ca n't make out just the particular brand -- that 's all that bothers me .
#Text=" But she 's our best bet .
